summary: A young woman has a fatal car accident, and is discovered by a simple-minded mountain hermit. He takes her lifeless body back to his cabin. There he nurtures her as if she were alive... and in his mind she is.
cast: Nick Searcy|Matt Keeslar|Joelle Carter|Andy Boswell|Sean Bridgers|Abby Corrigan|Katie Engelmaier|Donnie Evans|Shelby Finnie|Brett Gentile|Coby Jennings|Rebecca Koon|Kate Leahey|Casey Leet|June Letourneau|Terry Loughlin|John W. Love Jr.|Pauli Macy|Michael Mihm|Mike Monzitta|Giulia Pagano|Jeffrey Pillars|Annie Prentice|Michael Ruff|Mark Scarboro|Catherine Sewell|Gina Stewart|Strother Stingley|Dale Gould|David Lowe|Jennifer L. Ray
title: Cold Storage
